text: @thatginamiller @SuellaBraverman @BorisJohnson You’re a medical Dr now? You can categorically say everyone who’s had Covid19 recovers exactly the same way? You have spoken to everyone who recovered and know without any doubt that they all suffered and recovered the same way? AMAZING

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
